Simple Shopping List No account? create an account today! Email Address Shopping-List Password User name user Family Name (Optional) Submit
Shopping List analytics Settings Add ittems to cart
Failed to Authenticate Authentication Success
users user_account_settings username email familyname admin
item_name list_name price quantity
extra_email_verification extra email
execute order 666
Verification e-mail sent, Please check your inbox Click on the different grocery options in order to find out the price for the item, then you can select which grocery store list to add this item to! Find The Best Deals! Close You are not logged in. You can do the following Register Login Send to Email Tip: If you do not want to lose your data, and you already have an account, send this item to your own email (associated with this app) and it will show up as an external request Manage Children Connect Your whole famnily! set up a username, and then click on the button below to connect with your parents shopping list! type your desired user name add/change/see Parent\'s Name Requests Profile Settings Child Requests
signout Accept Into Family Delete Request Share Items With Your Parents! Type in your parents username, and they will get a request to add you to their shopping list, so that you can send them items to buy! Send Request Parent Username here
Bought Send Back To Requests Delete Child
Accept Item Into Cart
set changes Restore To Cart delete from list Add Item To List! My List Family List ListName Item Name eg. Bread
